delete_data_confirmation.title: Delete Data?
delete_data_confirmation.text: Are you sure you want to delete all your data?

landingpage.title: Health 19
landingpage.questionnaire_exists: You have already answered the Questionnaire

start_over_confirmation.title: Discard Data?
start_over_confirmation.text: Are you sure you want to discard all your data?

1.title: Questionnaire Hint 1
1.text: This is the first important hint

2.title: Questionnaire Hint 2
2.text: This is the second important hint

start.title: Start Questionnaire
start.text: You can start the Questionnaire now

medium.title: Medium Risk
medium.text: You have a medium risk to be infected with Corona

low.title: Low Risk
low.text: You have a low risk to be infected with Corona

high.title: High Risk
high.text: You have a high risk to be infected with Corona

1.title: Hand hygiene
1.text1: Pay attention to your hand hygiene
1.text2: Wash your hands often and thoroughly

2.title: Stay at home
2.text1: Stay at home as possible and avoid other people

3.title: Social Distancing
3.text1: Should you leave the house, please keep a distance of 1,5m to other people
3.text2: The usage of a mask is appropriate, especially if the minimum distance can not be adhered to

4.title: Call when in doubt
4.text1: Should you have doubts or questions please contact your doctor
4.text2: You can also call your local health office

restart.title: Complete Questionnaire again
restart.text1: Should you experience more symptoms in the next days you can always restart the questionnaire

account.title: Account
account.text: The Account overview is displayed here, including test results and other stuff

signup.title: Sign up
signup.text: The Sign up form belongs on this page
